job.title: Junior Software Engineer
job.description: pJunior Software Engineer Front EndppbrppGavinHeath is partnering with a client who is looking to hire a Junior Software Engineer on a 100 remote basis This is a direct hire positionppbrppstronguThis role could be a great fit for you ifustrongpulliYou have developed Reactbased web applications used by multiple users in a production environment orliliYou have developed web applications using another JavaScript framework used by multiple users in a production environment and have experience on a software development team orliliYou can provide multiple examples of nonproduction web applications you have developed and have formal education in frontend development and have experience on a software development teamliulpbrppstronguResponsibilitiesustrongpulliPlay a key role on a small highly productive team of experienced developersliliDevelop high quality product features that get used every dayliliProduce high quality code through thoughtful design diligent execution and good test coverageliliProvide wellstructured code for review by team members and engage in thoughtful and critical discussionsliliContribute ideas to the team and the company as a whole to improve how we workliulpbrppstronguQualificationsustrongpulliFormal computer science or software engineering education or equivalent knowledge and skills gained through multiyear professional experienceliliDemonstrable examples of modern web application components you have developedliliStrong software development fundamentals and problemsolving skillsliliAn understanding of user interface software designliliExperience using modern web application development tools and technologiesliliA passion for learning and educationliliA desire to go above and beyond to do what is right for our customersliliIntellectual curiosity and a willingness to learn and share with others you work withliliA high standard of excellence in the work you doliliGood communication skills and cognitive empathyliulpp
